column4: help ! I just installed gnuchess through the synaptic install system and now I can't find the program on my applications task bar or my desktop.. how do I run my new chess program ?
how do I make a desktop icon  or put it on the application taskbar ?
sometimes you have to reboot for items to appear.  seems to be a bug
reinstalling the package also seems to work sometimes...i dont know, its happened to me before
